website_summaries.verdict: A superb tablet floor stand that is sleek and contemporary and comes with an anti-theft enclosure.
pros: Can be bolted to a floor to guarantee the stand remains in place consistently
Case holder is vented to help keep a tablet operating at a safe temperature
Includes a cable management access port on the stand's pole to feed and hide any chargers, accessory cords, wires and cables
cons: More expensive than many comparable options
Can be difficult to mount and install

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand. It has a few install options. I used the included metal base. The base is heavy so there is little to no chance this is going to fall over. And it’s adjustable for what size IPad you have. You just unscrew and move the holders to a new position. It has a cutout for the camera and home button, but there is a insert to cover access to it if that is what you need. The locking feature is nice and works well. Plus there is plenty of space to install your charging cable. I used a little longer cable than the normal Apple cable for extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: A great stand for a good price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for use with a visitor management system at work. We have only had it for a week or so, but the unit seems very sturdy, looks good, and only took a few minutes to assemble. My only, very minor, complaint is that there is enough space in side that it’s easy to position the iPad wrong and block the camera. Still, when you manage to get it positioned correctly, it’s held in place pretty securely.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Bush

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!!!!! OMG this is a Must Buy... I purchased this for a vendor tradeshow event. It arrived on time, very easy to assemble. customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after ONE use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these. After ONE use... the screws that hold the ipad in place, fell out and were lost in transit from the tradeshow we used it at - I contacted MOUNT-IT who makes the product, and was told they can't find any replacement screws and to check back in TEN weeks to see if they could find any. I have explained to MOUNT-IT that without the screws (missing 2 of them) which is what holds the ipad IN place inside the holder - this is USELESS to me. Waiting a response from them as waiting 10 weeks to see IF they even find any is NOT a good solution.

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty easy to assemble and is really well made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use at a tradeshow for work, since we are giving out prizes by using the "Spinny Wheel" app. It was pretty easy to assemble and is really well made. The base is heavy and I won't worry about it being tipped over. Everything on it is a nice quality metal. The locking mechanism is a really nice feature. There is also a part that can disable the hoome button, if needed. There is also a hole for charging and the way it is made appears that someone can not remove your chrager from the iPad without first unlocking it. My boss and coworkers were impressed with the quality.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ipad Holder

It's a little cumbersome, but I love that I can leave it at the front door, and people automatically sign in when they walk through the door.
